verify

Class SpecHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • verify.SpecHelper

  • public class SpecHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates SMV model code for initializing a model to the set of states corresponding to an outcome. Formats CTL/LTL specifications for Cadence SMV or NuSMV.
    Author:
    gsanthan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpecHelper()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getCTLSpec(java.lang.String ctlSpec, java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String comment)
      Returns the CTL query (labeled with the propertyName) formatted to work with Cadence SMV or NuSMV model checker
      static java.lang.String getInitOutcomeSpec(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> outcome)
      Generates SMV model code in assignment style for initializing a model to the set of states corresponding to an outcome.
      static java.lang.String getInitOutcomeSpecConstraintStyle(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> outcome)
      Generates SMV model code in constraint style for initializing a model to the set of states corresponding to an outcome.
      static java.lang.String getLTLSpec(java.lang.String ltlSpec, java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String comment)
      Returns the LTL query (labeled with the propertyName) formatted to work with Cadence SMV or NuSMV model checker
